entry.title: Environment
entry.content: Club members participated in Tree plantation drive. Every member planted at least 1 tree in their surrounding area. Protecting environment is a collective responsibility of all.
entry.summary: Club members participated in Tree plantation drive. Every member planted at least 1 tree in their surrounding area. Protecting environment is a collective responsibility of all.

entry.title: releive hunger
entry.content: We club of Jaipur served food to 100 blind student.
entry.summary: We club of Jaipur served food to 100 blind student.

entry.title: Medical/Health
entry.content: We Santosh Agarwal sponsored Rs 5000/- for the treatment of a needy cancer patient diagnosed with lymphoma. The sum was given during the clubs board meeting.
entry.summary: We Santosh Agarwal sponsored Rs 5000/- for the treatment of a needy cancer patient diagnosed with lymphoma. The sum was given during the clubs board meeting.

entry.title: Festival and Celebration
entry.content: Momento and flower bouquet was gifted to Dr Reena Desai. The program was attended by club PST and few other members.
entry.summary: Momento and flower bouquet was gifted to Dr Reena Desai. The program was attended by club PST and few other members.

entry.title: Festival and Celebration
entry.content: Doctor’s day was celebrated. Ladies and gents doctors were felicitated. Purse and shawls were given as a token of appreciation to the doctor’s.
entry.summary: Doctor’s day was celebrated. Ladies and gents doctors were felicitated. Purse and shawls were given as a token of appreciation to the doctor’s.

entry.title: Education
entry.content: Members contributed Rs 5000/- towards the school fees of a poor student.
entry.summary: Members contributed Rs 5000/- towards the school fees of a poor student.

entry.title: contribution of money and Grain Distribution

link.title: contribution of money and Grain Distribution

entry.content: WE Club of Vasant Vihar contributed towards the marriage of Visually impaired persons Grain Distribution in association with a NGO Being Sevak Cost….. Rs.5000/-
entry.summary: WE Club of Vasant Vihar contributed towards the marriage of Visually impaired persons Grain Distribution in association with a NGO Being Sevak Cost….. Rs.5000/-

entry.title: Team kept a beautiful competition for the members

link.title: Team kept a beautiful competition for the members

entry.content: At the 3rd DIST. Cabinet meet our DIST. ADM. Team kept a beautiful competition for the members to be in their super cool summer dresses n carrying their summer drinks. All the members were very sporting n were present in lovely summer dresses in a joyful spirit. After the meeting there were games n lots of fun n frolic. There were prizes for best dressed also. The District President WE Sujata Rao thanked the Foundets for their Wonderful support and participating in the contest and encouraging the members. The District Team announced prizes for WE Savitha Nayak and WE Jyoti JAGASIA, Founders for their support 🙏🏻❤️🙏🏻 Thanks to Ms Vishestha Poddar for arranging n playing the games so enthusiastically n a cheerful manner
entry.summary: At the 3rd DIST. Cabinet meet our DIST. ADM. Team kept a beautiful competition for the members to be in their super cool summer dresses n carrying their summer drinks. All the members were very sporting n were present in lovely summer dresses in a joyful spirit. After the meeting there were games n lots of fun n frolic. There were prizes for best dressed also. The District President WE Sujata Rao thanked the Foundets for their Wonderful support and participating in the contest and encouraging the members. The District Team announced prizes for WE Savitha Nayak and WE Jyoti JAGASIA, Founders for their support 🙏🏻❤️🙏🏻 Thanks to Ms Vishestha Poddar for arranging n playing the games so enthusiastically n a cheerful manner

entry.title: Donated towards the operation
entry.content: WE club of Chembur donated towards the operation of a young girl Harsimran of 14 years who underwent multiple surgeries of a broken hand , crushed ribs and damaged spine that made her paralyzed below waist. She was discharged today from Hospital sitting on Wheel chair.Very happy moments for her, Family and us . WE Club of Chembur 1.40 Lacs WE club of Anushakti Royals Rs 5000/- Total amount spent Rs.1.45 Lacs. We would like to thank all whose Contributions made it possible

author.name: WE Club of Chembur : WE club of Anushakti Royals
